You have many choices when it comes to choosing a university. California State University, Long Beach envisions changing lives by expanding educational opportunities, championing creativity and preparing leaders for a changing world. Come live and learn amongst the nearly 35,000 students from across the United States and around the world. Declare your journey.
Students who are, or soon will be, high school graduates and have never attended a college or university since high school.
Students that have completed coursework at a college or university since leaving high school, but have not yet completed a Bachelor's degree.

Students that hold a Bachelor's degree and wish to continue their education for personal enrichment or to meet professional needs by pursuing a masters, doctorate, certificate, credential or second Bachelor's degree.
CSULB offers a vibrant, diverse environment for international students. Explore all the options for students joining us from outside of the United States.
CSULB offers valuable opportunities for lifelong learning, including continuing adult education, executive and professional programs, and special programs for K-12 students.
Percentage of undergraduate students receiving some type of financial aid: 64%

For over 65 years, CSULB has sought to provide students an extraordinary environment in which to discover their passions and pursue them with depth and determination.
Students who are, or soon will be, high school graduates and have never attended a college or university since high school.
Students that have completed coursework at a college or university since leaving high school, but have not yet completed a Bachelor's degree.
Students that hold a Bachelor's degree and wish to continue their education for personal enrichment or to meet professional needs by pursuing a masters or doctorate degree.

Students that hold a Bachelor's degree and wish to continue their education for personal enrichment or to meet professional needs by pursuing a credential, post-baccalaureate certificate, or second bachelor's degree.
CSULB offers a vibrant, diverse environment for international students. Explore all the options for students joining us from outside of the United States.
Beach Central Windows, 1st Floor Courtyard, Brotman Hall
For accessible assistance, please visit any Beach Central service window located in the 1st Floor Courtyard of Brotman Hall or call 562.985.5471.
Video of More Than A University
Each applicant to CSULB is considered with great care. We consider each applicant to CSULB as a whole person, and put enormous care into evaluating every application.
